email_must_be_at_least_5_characters: Email must be at least 5 characters long
password_must_be_at_least_8_characters: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password_must_contain_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password_must_contain_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password_must_contain_number: Password must contain at least one number
password_must_contain_special_character: Password must contain at least one special character
